briefdescription.para: Maps uniform names to their descriptions.

detaileddescription.para: Contains only uniforms in the default block, i.e. not within named blocks.

briefdescription.para: Maps uniform block names to their descriptions.
Maps per-vertex attribute names to their descriptions.
Maps sampler uniform names to their assigned texture units.
Maps texture units to the texture handles that are currently bound to them.
Whether this program has been validated.
Tries to create a shader program from the given sources.

detaileddescription.para: Throws an exception on compile/link errors.

briefdescription.para: Bind this program as the currently used one in the OpenGL context.
Does what the description of Renderable specifies - updates the uniform values and draws the Geometry if it's not nullptr.

detaileddescription.para: If geometry is null, only the uniform values are updated.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the shader program contains a uniform variable with the given name.
Returns a list of active vertex attributes in the shader program.

detaileddescription.para: Active attributes are those which have an effect on the shader output, meaning they are included in the output calculation and are not unused. Inactive attributes may or may not be present in the list - in particular, in the OpenGL implementation they will most likely be missing. The returned value is a map from the attribute location to its type. Locations need not be consecutive.

briefdescription.para: A handle to an OpenGL shader program.
